text:
Estelle Harris, born as "Estelle Nussbaum", (born April 4, 1928 in Manhattan, New York) is a comedian, actress, voice actress, and television actress. She is best known for her role as Estelle Costanza in "Seinfeld". To younger audiences she is known for her role as Mrs. Potato Head in the "Toy Story" franchise. She is also known as Muriel on "The Suite Life of Zach and Cody".
Early life.
Harris was born on April 4, 1928 in New York City, New York to Jewish-American parents, Issac Nussbaum and to Anna Nussbaum
. Her career began in 1977 in the movie "Looking Up"; since then, she had appeared in "Out to Sea", "Toy Story 2", "Tarzan II", "Toy Story 3", and "Toy Story 4".
Personal life.
Harris is currently married to Sy Harris and they have 3 children together. Harris currently lives in West Hollywood, California. Estelle and her husband Sy, escaped serious injuries when their car blew a tire and flipped twice on September 20, 2001.

annotations.surface_form: The Suite Life of Zach and Cody
